channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- DataPower Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- DataPower Gateway

item.title: CVE-2019-4621|2024-08-04T19:40:48.225Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway 7.6.0.0-7 throug 6.0.14 and 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.5 have a default administrator account that is enabled if the IPMI LAN channel is enabled. A remote attacker could use this account to gain unauthorised access to the BMC. IBM X-Force ID: 168883.

item.title: CVE-2020-4205|2024-08-04T08:00:07.378Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.8 could allow an authenticated user to bypass security restrictions, and continue to access the server even after authentication certificates have been revolked. IBM X-Force ID: 174961.

item.title: CVE-2021-38872|2024-08-04T01:51:20.273Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway 10.0.2.0, 10.0.3.0, 10.0.1.0 through 10.0.1.4, and 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.17 could allow a remote user to cause a denial of service by consuming resources with multiple requests. IBM X-Force ID: 208348.

item.title: CVE-2020-4831|2024-08-04T08:14:58.980Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.1.0 uses weaker than expected cryptographic algorithms that could allow an attacker to decrypt highly sensitive information. IBM X-Force ID: 189965.

item.title: CVE-2020-4528|2024-08-04T08:07:48.967Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM MQ Appliance (IBM DataPower Gateway 10.0.0.0 and 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.12) could allow a local user, under special conditions, to obtain highly sensitive information from log files. IBM X-Force ID: 182658.

item.title: CVE-2020-5008|2024-08-04T08:22:08.510Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway 10.0.0.0 through 10.0.1.0 and 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.14 stores sensitive information in GET request parameters. This may lead to information disclosure if unauthorized parties have access to the URLs via server logs, referrer header or browser history. IBM X-Force ID: 193033.

item.title: CVE-2020-4992|2024-08-04T08:22:07.565Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.16 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 192737.

item.title: CVE-2020-5014|2024-08-04T08:22:08.550Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway V10 and V2018 could allow a local attacker with administrative privileges to execute arbitrary code on the system using a server-side requesr forgery attack. IBM X-Force ID: 193247.

item.title: CVE-2020-4581|2024-08-04T08:07:49.075Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.12 could allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service by sending a chunked transfer-encoding HTTP/2 request. IBM X-Force ID: 184441.

item.title: CVE-2020-4203|2024-08-04T08:00:06.924Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.8 could potentially disclose highly sensitive information to a privileged user due to improper access controls. IBM X-Force ID: 174956.

item.title: CVE-2020-4579|2024-08-04T08:07:48.994Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.12 could allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service by sending a specially crafted HTTP/2 request with invalid characters. IBM X-Force ID: 184438.

item.title: CVE-2021-38910|2024-08-04T01:51:20.664Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway V10CD, 10.0.1, and 2108.4.1 could allow a remote attacker to bypass security restrictions, caused by the improper validation of input. By sending a specially crafted JSON message, an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to modify structure and fields. IBM X-Force ID: 209824.

item.title: CVE-2020-4994|2024-08-04T08:22:08.181Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway 10.0.1.0 through 10.0.1.4 and 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.17 could allow a remote user to cause a temporary denial of service by sending invalid HTTP requests. IBM X-Force ID: 192906.

item.title: CVE-2020-4580|2024-08-04T08:07:48.990Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.12 could allow a remote attacker to cause a denial of service by sending a specially crafted a JSON request with invalid characters. IBM X-Force ID: 184439.

item.title: CVE-2021-38944|2024-08-04T01:51:20.786Z -- ibm -- datapower%20gateway
item.description: IBM DataPower Gateway 10.0.2.0 through 1.0.3.0, 10.0.1.0 through 10.0.1.5, and 2018.4.1.0 through 2018.4.1.18 is vulnerable to HTTP header injection, caused by improper validation of input by the HOST headers. This could allow an attacker to conduct various attacks against the vulnerable system, including cross-site scripting, cache poisoning or session hijacking. IBM X-Force ID: 211236.
